article_title: VADS, formerly PADS, gets new name and services
article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. You can come back at the end of your 30-day period for another 5 free articles, or you can purchase a subscription at this time and continue to enjoy valuable local news and information. If you need help, please contact our office at 559-784-5000. You need an online service to view this article in its entirety.

Have an online subscription? Login Now Need an online subscription? Already a Print Subscriber?

Current print subscribers 1 PRINT SUBSCRIBER ACCESS - TOTAL DIGITAL $1.99 for 28 days e-Edition + Online Current print subscribers! Activate your total digital access for only $1.99 for four weeks. Once your current print subscription expires, make sure to renew with the ALL ACCESS subscription.

Need an account? Create one now.

og.description: Announcement made during Rock-a-thonPorterville Adult Day Services (PADS) has changed its name and will now be known as Valley Adult Day Services (VADS).
